review_text: I have been training with the child. After she fell asleep, I had no sleep. After going to the bathroom in the middle of the night, it was difficult to fall asleep again. I woke up in the middle of the night with dry mouth. I went to the toilet and fell asleep again quickly. It is helpful for sleep quality. Recommended

Healthy Sleep & Wake is a supplement that is designed to support sleep and relaxation. All components are natural and well-known, so I have no doubt about their effectiveness. L-tryptophan is an amino acid that comes only from food. L-tryptophan promotes the production of serotonin and melatonin, stabilizes the emotional state, has a calming effect on the nervous system, helps control weight, reduces appetite, neutralizes the effects of nicotine and alcohol on the body, helps relieve cravings for bad habits, normalizes sleep, and helps improve overall well-being. Passionflower is effective for neuro-vegetative dystonia, states of fear, anxiety and nervousness. Valerian root has a mild calming effect, has a pronounced effect and does not cause negative side effects. GABA (GABA) is responsible for normalizing sleep and wakefulness, reducing mental arousal, stimulating the anterior pituitary gland. Its main function is to regulate the concentrations of hormones and excitatory neurotransmitters. In general, I recommend it to everyone!
